titleStmt.title: A declaration vnto the Lordes, of the Iewes desire these fiftene yeres for Ebrew explication of our Greke gospell hindered by a brase of wicked selly D.D.: wherof the God of Iewes & Gentiles hath payd the one: & will pay the other: when he hath detected who he is.
titleStmt.author: Broughton, Hugh, 1549-1612.

notesStmt.note: Place of publication conjectured by STC.
Reproduction of the original in the Emmanuel College Library.
